content.rendered:
Please Note

If you are qualified as a MBV Trainer, you are certified as a VABL Trainer, and vice versa.

excerpt.rendered:
• Understanding VABL rules and the Professional Boxing and Combat Sports Act 1985.
  • Guidelines on weight classes, age divisions, and weigh-in procedures.
  • Effective methods for preparing boxers, including equipment and protective gear requirements.
  • Identifying concussion symptoms and protocols for management and return-to-fight.
  • Proper interactions with officials and adherence to safety protocols.
  • Emphasizing professionalism and maintaining sport integrity.
  • On Quiz completion VABL license trainers licence form will become avalible to fill in order to recive licence as well as certificate of completion
